body: Sorry but the drawing kinda turns me off, I've seen better stuff than this like Sawada's Milf jugging down a beer glass of cum drawing. Maybe this is your unique way of drawing
Welp, i guess that i've digged deep enough to reach the peak of "fucking degenerate" level of Doujinshi. Art aside, of course.
there is like 5 more manga by calpis koubou out there, what happened to the uploads?
